section.name: Component Type Descriptors and Deployment Directives

subsection.name: Component as a Part Strategy
subsection.p: The transit part XML-schema specification provides support for the declaration of specialized deployment strategies. The DPML component schema is defined as a specialization of the part strategy. As such, a component directive may be used within the scope of an enclosing part.
